greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of Dyck paths with n nodes and altitude k (1 <= k <= n).
link: Czabarka, É., Flórez, R., Junes, L., & Ramírez, J. L. (2018). Enumerations of peaks and valleys on non-decreasing Dyck paths. Discrete Mathematics, 341(10), 2789-2807.
formula: Czabarka et al. give a g.f. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 09 2019
maple: A318942 := proc(n,k) # Theorem 7 of Czabarka et al.
xref: Col. 1 is alternate Fibonaccis, cols. 2, 3, 4 are A318941, A318943, A318944.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 18 2018
